ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Received"), FS_Fees__c > 0, Opportunity__r.Account.BillingState = 'South Dakota', NOT(OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Received', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Locked', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Open', RecordType.DeveloperName ='HB_Open', RecordType.DeveloperName ='H_B_Received' )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Broker or Service Fees are not allowed for South Dakota.
